name: Dread
overview: Dread is a Doom clone by KK/Altair for Amiga 500. Doom is an FPS game made by id Software and originally released in 1993 for DOS. It was ported the following year for the Jaguar, Linux, PC-98, and the Sega 32X. It was again ported in 1995 for the 3DO and Windows (aka Doom95). In 1996, it was ported for the SNES/Super Nintendo, and in 2001, it was ported for the Gameboy Advance. As for the Amiga, it was, of course, never released for this system. Until now, that is!
